Formal Learning Theory: a bi-weekly online reading group 2020/2021

Dec 8, 2020 • Aleksandra Samonek

Starting December 2020, we will be reading Systems that learn: an introduction to learning theory by Jain, Osherson, Royer and Sharma.

[STL2] Jain, S., Osherson, D., Royer, J. S., & Sharma, A. (1999). Systems that learn: an introduction to learning theory. MIT press.

STL2 is not to be confused with an earlier version of the same book:

[STL1] Osherson, D., Stob, M., & Weinstein, S. (1986). Systems that learn, An introduction to learning theory. MIT press.

The sessions are open to all interested.

Please send me an email if you would like to receive the link to our meeting.

Reading group times and readings

December 16, 2020 (Wednesday)

Time:
17:00 - 19:00 CET (Brussels)
16:00 - 18:00 GMT (London)
11:00 - 13:00 GMT-5 (New York)

Readings:

  • STL2 chapter 1, Introduction (pp. 3-14)
  • STL2 chapter 2, Formalities (pp. 15-26)

Exercises:

  • 2-1 — 2-8, p. 26 (STL2)
